thread.section_title: Biblio.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Biblio.com | www.biblio.com | 14 of 109
thread.title: l. befera

author: l. befera
title: l. befera
text: I have been ordering books with Biblio.com for years and have nearly always had a very good experience with them. The books are always in exactly the shape they describe, the prices are extremely reasonable, and they're always willing and quick to refund if I've ordered duplicates or if I'm unhappy for any reason. Further, they get the book to me quickly, which is sometimes an issue, as when I was writing my dissertation and needed the books ASAP. They're on my preferred list of booksellers and I always try them before the other online stores, including the famous one that starts with an "A".
